snippet.title: Everglyph Trials - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3005840/Everglyph_Trials?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=reveal
Website: https://everglyphtrials.com

Everglyph Trials is a combat roguelite deckbuilder in which you unleash devastating combos with unique dual cards. Battle deadly foes, adapt your deck, and uncover its secrets.

Follow us on social media
- Twitter https://twitter.com/TabiHQ
- Facebook https://www.facebook.com/TabiEntertainment
